properties.entry: SELECT RE_NO ,M.MEM_NICKNAME ,M.MEM_ID ,REVIEW_TITLE ,REVIEW_RATE ,REVIEW_ENROLLDATE ,M.MEM_GRADE ,COUNT FROM STORE_RE SR JOIN MEMBER M ON (SR.REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY RE_NO DESC
SELECT RE_NO ,M.MEM_NICKNAME ,M.MEM_ID ,REVIEW_TITLE ,REVIEW_RATE ,REVIEW_ENROLLDATE ,M.MEM_GRADE ,COUNT FROM STORE_RE SR JOIN MEMBER M ON (SR.REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEM_NO)

SELECT S.STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_ADDRESS , STORE_INTRO , STORE_IMG_PATH , STORE_POPULARITY , STORE_POP_INFO , STORE_POP_PATH , M.MEM_NICKNAME , REVIEW_CONTENT , REVIEW_IMG FROM STORE S JOIN STORE_RE SR ON (SR.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(SR.REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEM_NO) WHERE S.STORE_NO = ?
UPDATE STORE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE STORE_NO = ?

SELECT S.STORE_NO , STORE_IMG_PATH , STORE_NAME , STORE_ADDRESS , STORE_INTRO , STORE_POPULARITY , STORE_POP_INFO , SR.REVIEW_CONTENT , SR.REVIEW_IMG , SR.REVIEW_WRITER FROM STORE S JOIN STORE_RE SR ON (SR.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO) ORDER BY STORE_NO DESC

SELECT S.STORE_NO , STORE_IMG_PATH , STORE_NAME , STORE_ADDRESS , STORE_INTRO , STORE_POPULARITY , STORE_POP_INFO , SR.REVIEW_CONTENT , SR.REVIEW_IMG , SR.REVIEW_WRITER FROM STORE S JOIN STORE_RE SR ON (SR.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO)

SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_TITLE , STORE_NAME , SCRAP_COUNT , REVIEW_ENROLLDATE FROM STORE_RE JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = REVIEW_WRITER) JOIN STORE USING (STORE_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_ENROLLDATE DESC )A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2
SELECT STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_ADDRESS , STORE_PHONE FROM STORE ORDER BY STORE_NO DESC
